desc: Rodents Away Odor Free is an odorless mouse repellent for use in indoor spaces, including modes of transport (e.g. cabins, homes, boats, cars, tractors, trailers) where house mice are present.

layout.text: Repels mice away and deters them from coming back. Use Rodents Away Odor Free in any indoor space, including modes of transport (e.g. cabins, homes, boats, cars, tractors, trailers). Watch the video for a demonstration on how it works.
Net Contents: 120 g (3 x 40 g sachets)
Net Contents: 240 g (6 x 40 g sachets)
